content:
Civilian Russians discuss the forced involvement of Russian citizens in voting to ensure a high level of voter appearance at polling stations.

The interception of telephone conversations was published by the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine.

“Well, because from Moscow it came to an order to vote in the hospital. And they took the attachment there. Jeanne organized cars, ” - Rospovyda Zhinka.

“They said that we all come, otherwise we will not come, organize a departure to us. So you see, even all conditions. I did not want to go, but they are forced, ” - Doda ven.

As reported by the Armyinform, the Security Service of UkraineReportedabout the correspondence suspicion of the leaders of the DNR terrorist organization, which organized the pseudo -elections of the President of the Russian Federation on the temporarily occupied part of Donetsk region.
title: “The order is to vote for everyone. I didn't want to go, but they are forced, "
description: The interception of telephone conversations was published by the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense...
author: Army Inform
